title: FS: High grades: Lots of HOFers, rare Joss, rare Merkle Pied 350! Many others
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: High grades: Lots of HOFers, rare Joss, rare Merkle Pied 350! Many others
posts.post_content:
Hal Chase (dark cap) PSA 7.5...SCap 350-460 overstrike, 50/50 both ways, razor sharp corners..$2,000,Will not find a better one in the hobby... reduced to $1750
Bobby Wallace Pied 150 PSA 7, sharp card.....$2000

Addie Joss (Pitching) PSA 7...Extremely scarce SCap 350-460 fact. 25, razor corners....$2150

Addie Joss (Pitching) Sov. 350 PSA 7...Tough apple green, perfectly centered.....$2350

Fred Merkle (Port.) SGC 86..Pied 150, corners are 8's, card was originally a PSA 7.5 believe it or not! Centered 50/50..$1500. The last PSA 7.5 sold for over $2,000, this is a fabulous card (trust me, remarkable)... reduced to $1375/ reduced to $1250 (looks like an 8)

Fred Merkle (Port.) PSA 7..Pied 350!!, almost impossible to find this card with a Pied 350 back, razor sharp corners.


Mike Donlin (batting) PSA 7, razor sharp corners, solid centering..$750...NOW $695/ reduced to $650

George Brown (Chicago) SGC 86, razor corners, looks like an 8, incredibly low population....$1500

Larry Doyle (batting) SGC 88, perfectly centered, amazing card......$1500

Tris Speaker PSA 7OC, SCap 350/fact.25, extremely scarce back, majority are Pied 350's, corners are 8's...$1985/ reduced to $1750

Zack Wheat PSA 7, Pied 350/460, very sharp and centered card....$2000





Also have these if interested, send email for scans..
Chief Bender (Port.)....PSA 7

Jack Chesbro GAI 7....I have owned this card since GAI started grading, original GAI holder when they were strong..
Vive Lindaman PSA 7.5..Pied 150, Extremely tough common in high grade
Hal Chase (white cap) PSA 7, SCap 150, razor sharp corners and fantastic color....
Zack Wheat SGC 70 Tolstoi, beauty of card....$795
Joe Tinker (Port.) SGC 60, 50/50 centering, Bright orange color, rare variation!...$850
Out of my price range, but beautiful cards....
Out of my price range, but beautiful cards....
